info.name: DarkOpaque with random images
info.description:
A clean modern android messanges with partially transparrent backing and a picture in the background. The image is randomly selected. I like variety

Remember to set Messanges to use the dark theme, as this css uses that as its base.

data.title: Dark images results in unreadable usernames and text messages.
love it ! You just need to put dark mode before using it
